summary: „But no matter what love throws at you, you have to believe in it. You have to believe in love stories and prince charmings and...

summary: “Fearless is not the absence of fear. It’s not being completely unafraid. To me, fearless is having fears. Fearless is having...
body: “Fearless is not the absence of fear. It’s not being completely unafraid. To me, fearless is having fears. Fearless is having doubts. Lots of them. To me, fearless is living in spite of those things that scare you to death.”

reblog.comment: “Fearless is not the absence of fear. It’s not being completely unafraid. To me, fearless is having fears. Fearless is having doubts. Lots of them. To me, fearless is living in spite of those things that scare you to death.”

blog.name: bikarakoydegil
blog.title: Bi Karaköy Degil
blog.description: From a day in Karaköy 2012, figuring it out. | Eser, İstanbul

summary: Love, a laserquest
title: Love, a laserquest
body:
Chapter IV: The Retro Effect

Robert Mapplethorpe and Patti Smith, Brooklyn, 1968, by Lloyd Ziff

“Eser!” cried my friend, grabbing my arms hastily, “Have you heard?? Don’t make any love or whatever decisions right now, the Venus bitch is gonna be on the retro, everything will go wrong.”

“Oh, c’mon” I said, “Do you believe this stuff?”

“It’s serious, the cycle is happening every 1,5 years but this time after 8 years it’s on this scorpion retro that gonna last at least for 6 weeks and the past will reassure and the past mistakes and pains will rise again, people that gone will come again, and whatever decision you wanna take will go terribly bad…”

“Well, yeah, a-ha, okay.” I replied, not to continue this any longer, “Whatever.”

Didn’t know I was gonna need to add a new chapter to this writing series that was supposed to be done long ago, didn’t realize we were about to enter the cycle, then I was already beginning doing things that caused me disappointments before or, another friend read from a coffee cup saying “You may love someone, or choose not to, it’s just so blur”, only a day before, I met that someone.

The Hope

Right time, weird place, with right and so wrong person in many ways, I met that someone. He still has no clue though, later on I was remembering I in fact saw him somewhere exactly a year ago, liked him in secret and he didn’t see me. This time around, it was him to write me first, offering me a trick or treat, while my caution was already bending down across his cool and handsome face.

He was partly honest with what he’s expecting for, however didn’t hope at all that was gonna meet someone he could actually talk. But I didn’t know either what I was expecting, other than it was not to able to have stories as it before.

So we talked. And he told. Told so much that I was wondering if he ever told these stories anyone with these details, this quickly, pouring down his feelings into my hands to keep them safe. So that he could have someone by his side, been understood at last then again by someone he was so excited to meet. It must be amazing and new, filling him with dreams and expectations, that things gonna be changing now, he’s not alone now, he’s in love now.

Hasn’t he ever seen what’s missing here? Or at least feel?

He kept asking me what I was thinking cos I was losing my train of thoughts as in my usual mood, even I thought I was giving away too much. At least at first he tried to solve the girl who solves him, though I was thinking oh baby, people always tell me their stories, even the most private ones, only if they feel I’m listening. Does he remember I’m telling him?

But I don’t wanna listen everyone, y'know, I’m choosing to. Only I had the slightest sense of been broken, and not being able to come out of it, or still have the need to share so them to understand, when even they’re not aware they need it.

Then I could sense it for myself, solve and gave them back in definable words, in other meaning touching them. I should be thankful for the people that truly love me love me not for I’m making them feel okay and understood, but simply love me.

I listened him because he was damn good looking, had the soul and eye of an artist, could almost be my Robert Mapplethorpe, was really kind and making dinners for me.

I continued to listen him because I wanted to experience the share of caring, with a man I could also be friend.

Because he has no clue, but in the beginning of this year, I was kind of dating his worse version for a man but way better as a lover. I had tried but couldn’t find a way to truly communicate with him, didn’t want to meet him with my family nor friends, but wished for someone I could, thence Universe steps in.

The Truth

“You’re thinking too much.” once again my friends told me, but it is not something I can help. However, “Maybe it shouldn’t be this hard, whether you have doubts, it must be true. Maybe even you shouldn’t be thinking this much.” was something new. Nazım Hikmet tells the heart of the truly loving’s, wins the war of staying over going away. The mind of mine that never stops, would win the war, even I wished to choose the love.

Because we were seeing each other too much, me making good old mistakes all over again, I began to realize too soon that he asked me less and less what I was thinking. I began to see it was meaningless to wait any messages, though very weirdly I was not that sad or miserable. It was oddly, fastly fading away. The cracks and breaks you had to learn mending strengths you before you become aware of it as parts of growing up. Even while it doesn’t mean you don’t miss it, it’s merely being in love with love. She is not the cool woman I desire to see through the lenses, I am not the Robert she dreams. Did he see this before me? Probably, because he was clever enough not to getting to know me through my writings. Maybe he saw what was missing in his initial feelings and it just didn’t fit in. Maybe I realized we are both lazy and unstable, lost in our thoughts to go up and make a change.

I blame Erich Fromm, JK Rowling, Melis Danişmend, John Lennon and Taylor Swift* for making me think about love this much.

What they taught me in common, combining my own philosophy is that when you’re old enough it’s your responsibility to take control of your own life, not your parents, not your country, no one. Your responsibility to know yourself and trying to reach there, it’s making the decision and the road that counts. Only then, you could truly love yourself, at least make an effort to make peace with yourself, and the others would mean less. Even the ones who love and care about you, even you should consider what they think of you. You should accept your parents as they are, stop being sorry for who you are. Then you won’t need someone to love or support you, for you to fill your missing parts.

Well, I wish it would be as easy as writing to make it happen.

You can choose loving someone, cos you need it, alongside the way it could help loving yourself back. It’s just more pleasant like Lennon said.

Or you simply don’t.

And what I’ve learned from these past years is, it’s all okay, we all experience the both sides.

Why do you live all these is a good question if you don’t ask it as a complaint. Is it because of Venus the bitch? Universe showing you old problems in new forms so you to finally solve them? Instagram posts you hate in jealousy?

The last one definitely finds its own way somehow. But don’t deny it all comes back to you. No you can’t control everything, yes they manipulate us even within our deepest actions, and there’re endless variables inside this equation that reaches the results we can’t dream, but you’re not the center of any universe, you’re part of it. So it’s only natural you’re evolving together, you can’t expect controlling it all over. You should welcome the surprises, bad or good, by taking risks. And work so hard so you can have a few lucky chances. 

Making the same mistakes takes me similar results, I can’t claim it’s the Venus or the Universe.

As in a dinner we were sharing together there was nothing to talk, out of blue Freud made us realize, or it was just me realizing for the first time that, Universe doesn’t bring you old problems in new shapes, you were never in peace with your actions so you lead the way to the old mistaken routs, to see if you can solve it, that it was not your mistake but others’. Well it’s not, some routs are closed by circumstances, or you’re not facing the truths. Or in my case, I began to assume the odd and quick way is also normal. I’m taking my experience after all, I’ll always be unstable and messy, though don’t want fake games no longer as my reality.

*Erich Fromm - The Art of Loving, Lennon - this quote, JKR - especially this and this, Melis - this, Taylor - probably every single song she’s written on her last 2 albums

(Ch. I , Ch. II , Ch.III, Ch. IV & Ch.V)

So it’s only natural you’re evolving together, you can’t expect controlling it all over. You should welcome the surprises, bad or good, by taking risks. And work so hard so you can have a few lucky chances. 

Making the same mistakes takes me similar results, I can’t claim it’s the Venus or the Universe.

As in a dinner we were sharing together there was nothing to talk, out of blue Freud made us realize, or it was just me realizing for the first time that, Universe doesn’t bring you old problems in new shapes, you were never in peace with your actions so you lead the way to the old mistaken routs, to see if you can solve it, that it was not your mistake but others’. Well it’s not, some routs are closed by circumstances, or you’re not facing the truths. Or in my case, I began to assume the odd and quick way is also normal. I’m taking my experience after all, I’ll always be unstable and messy, though don’t want fake games no longer as my reality.

*Erich Fromm - The Art of Loving, Lennon - this quote, JKR - especially this and this, Melis - this, Taylor - probably every single song she’s written on her last 2 albums

(Ch. I , Ch. II , Ch.III, Ch. IV & Ch.V)
trail.content:
Chapter IV: The Retro Effect

Robert Mapplethorpe and Patti Smith, Brooklyn, 1968, by Lloyd Ziff

“Eser!” cried my friend, grabbing my arms hastily, “Have you heard?? Don’t make any love or whatever decisions right now, the Venus bitch is gonna be on the retro, everything will go wrong.”

“Oh, c’mon” I said, “Do you believe this stuff?”

“It’s serious, the cycle is happening every 1,5 years but this time after 8 years it’s on this scorpion retro that gonna last at least for 6 weeks and the past will reassure and the past mistakes and pains will rise again, people that gone will come again, and whatever decision you wanna take will go terribly bad…”

“Well, yeah, a-ha, okay.” I replied, not to continue this any longer, “Whatever.”

Didn’t know I was gonna need to add a new chapter to this writing series that was supposed to be done long ago, didn’t realize we were about to enter the cycle, then I was already beginning doing things that caused me disappointments before or, another friend read from a coffee cup saying “You may love someone, or choose not to, it’s just so blur”, only a day before, I met that someone.

The Hope

Right time, weird place, with right and so wrong person in many ways, I met that someone. He still has no clue though, later on I was remembering I in fact saw him somewhere exactly a year ago, liked him in secret and he didn’t see me. This time around, it was him to write me first, offering me a trick or treat, while my caution was already bending down across his cool and handsome face.

He was partly honest with what he’s expecting for, however didn’t hope at all that was gonna meet someone he could actually talk. But I didn’t know either what I was expecting, other than it was not to able to have stories as it before.

So we talked. And he told. Told so much that I was wondering if he ever told these stories anyone with these details, this quickly, pouring down his feelings into my hands to keep them safe. So that he could have someone by his side, been understood at last then again by someone he was so excited to meet. It must be amazing and new, filling him with dreams and expectations, that things gonna be changing now, he’s not alone now, he’s in love now.

Hasn’t he ever seen what’s missing here? Or at least feel?

He kept asking me what I was thinking cos I was losing my train of thoughts as in my usual mood, even I thought I was giving away too much. At least at first he tried to solve the girl who solves him, though I was thinking oh baby, people always tell me their stories, even the most private ones, only if they feel I’m listening. Does he remember I’m telling him?

But I don’t wanna listen everyone, y'know, I’m choosing to. Only I had the slightest sense of been broken, and not being able to come out of it, or still have the need to share so them to understand, when even they’re not aware they need it.

Then I could sense it for myself, solve and gave them back in definable words, in other meaning touching them. I should be thankful for the people that truly love me love me not for I’m making them feel okay and understood, but simply love me.

I listened him because he was damn good looking, had the soul and eye of an artist, could almost be my Robert Mapplethorpe, was really kind and making dinners for me.

I continued to listen him because I wanted to experience the share of caring, with a man I could also be friend.

Because he has no clue, but in the beginning of this year, I was kind of dating his worse version for a man but way better as a lover. I had tried but couldn’t find a way to truly communicate with him, didn’t want to meet him with my family nor friends, but wished for someone I could, thence Universe steps in.

The Truth

“You’re thinking too much.” once again my friends told me, but it is not something I can help. However, “Maybe it shouldn’t be this hard, whether you have doubts, it must be true. Maybe even you shouldn’t be thinking this much.” was something new. Nazım Hikmet tells the heart of the truly loving’s, wins the war of staying over going away. The mind of mine that never stops, would win the war, even I wished to choose the love.

Because we were seeing each other too much, me making good old mistakes all over again, I began to realize too soon that he asked me less and less what I was thinking. I began to see it was meaningless to wait any messages, though very weirdly I was not that sad or miserable. It was oddly, fastly fading away. The cracks and breaks you had to learn mending strengths you before you become aware of it as parts of growing up. Even while it doesn’t mean you don’t miss it, it’s merely being in love with love. She is not the cool woman I desire to see through the lenses, I am not the Robert she dreams. Did he see this before me? Probably, because he was clever enough not to getting to know me through my writings. Maybe he saw what was missing in his initial feelings and it just didn’t fit in. Maybe I realized we are both lazy and unstable, lost in our thoughts to go up and make a change.

I blame Erich Fromm, JK Rowling, Melis Danişmend, John Lennon and Taylor Swift* for making me think about love this much.

What they taught me in common, combining my own philosophy is that when you’re old enough it’s your responsibility to take control of your own life, not your parents, not your country, no one. Your responsibility to know yourself and trying to reach there, it’s making the decision and the road that counts. Only then, you could truly love yourself, at least make an effort to make peace with yourself, and the others would mean less. Even the ones who love and care about you, even you should consider what they think of you. You should accept your parents as they are, stop being sorry for who you are. Then you won’t need someone to love or support you, for you to fill your missing parts.

Well, I wish it would be as easy as writing to make it happen.

You can choose loving someone, cos you need it, alongside the way it could help loving yourself back. It’s just more pleasant like Lennon said.

Or you simply don’t.

And what I’ve learned from these past years is, it’s all okay, we all experience the both sides.

Why do you live all these is a good question if you don’t ask it as a complaint. Is it because of Venus the bitch? Universe showing you old problems in new forms so you to finally solve them? Instagram posts you hate in jealousy?

The last one definitely finds its own way somehow. But don’t deny it all comes back to you. No you can’t control everything, yes they manipulate us even within our deepest actions, and there’re endless variables inside this equation that reaches the results we can’t dream, but you’re not the center of any universe, you’re part of it. So it’s only natural you’re evolving together, you can’t expect controlling it all over. You should welcome the surprises, bad or good, by taking risks. And work so hard so you can have a few lucky chances. 

Making the same mistakes takes me similar results, I can’t claim it’s the Venus or the Universe.

As in a dinner we were sharing together there was nothing to talk, out of blue Freud made us realize, or it was just me realizing for the first time that, Universe doesn’t bring you old problems in new shapes, you were never in peace with your actions so you lead the way to the old mistaken routs, to see if you can solve it, that it was not your mistake but others’. Well it’s not, some routs are closed by circumstances, or you’re not facing the truths. Or in my case, I began to assume the odd and quick way is also normal. I’m taking my experience after all, I’ll always be unstable and messy, though don’t want fake games no longer as my reality.

*Erich Fromm - The Art of Loving, Lennon - this quote, JKR - especially this and this, Melis - this, Taylor - probably every single song she’s written on her last 2 albums

(Ch. I , Ch. II , Ch.III, Ch. IV & Ch.V)

summary: I am definitely a Swiftie even before I knew @taylorswift existed! Okay well that was exaggerating. But seriously guys ... Im...
body:
IM A CERTIFIED SWIFTIE!

I am definitely a Swiftie even before I knew @taylorswift existed! Okay well that was exaggerating. But seriously guys … Im not kidding 😇 (even before i knew there a was a swiftie).

I was 13 back then when I first got a guitar, its white, then there I was learning how to play songs of taylor swift. The very first song of Taylor that I learned to play whole is FIFTEEN, and then YOU BELONG WITH ME, and so on on so forth. And then i knew it was too late because taylor already has two albums at the time, so i gotta go search and download her first two albums and play it over and over again and learn how to play it.

There was also a time when i was 16 and i got so inspired by the people and my life when i was in highschool, so i got the time and wrote songs about pupply love, my inspiration, my friends and about college.

And up until now, everytime taylor will announce a new album or a new song is playing in the radio, i gotta go on the internet and search the song, download a copy, print out the lyrics and chords and after 5 to 10 times playing it repeatedly on my mp3 player, there i was playing it verse by verse to chorus until i can play it whole.

After Fearless, there comes Speak Now and Red and 1989 and today REPUTATION, her best of the best album in my opinion. Sorry taylor buy is it just me or did you get a peak inside my head and get those ideas to be an inspiration for reputation? Cause i gotta say its like were living the same life at the time? I really really can relate to it.. Did you wrote thia for me? BTW, I Love You @taylorswift .

And right then and there a young Filipina SWIFTIE is Born.
